stimulusHtml: Let g be the function defined by  g( x )= âˆ« 1 x f ( t )dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4461@ on the open interval (0, 4). For 0 < x < 4, find all values of x at which g has a relative extremum. Determine whether g has a relative maximum or a relative minimum at each of these values. Justify your answer.

features.html: Let f be a function that is continuous on the interval [0, 4). The function f is twice differentiable except at x = 2. The function f and its derivatives have the properties indicated in the table above, where DNE indicates that the derivatives of f do not exist at x = 2.
